message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. Let me know if that works for you!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can do a bit better than $8500, but I need to make a profit. How about $9000?
I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $8200?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make a bit of a concession, but I still need to make a profit. How about we meet in the middle at $9250?
I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go as low as $8000?
